text: Daram may refer to: * Daram, Mazandaran, Iran (درام - Darām) * Daram, Zanjan, Iran (درم - Daram) * Daram, Samar, Philippines * SS Daram, an American cargo ship that ran aground on Long Bar Reef, Bermuda ==See also== * Daram Rud, Kurdistan, a village in Sursur Rural District, Muchesh District, Kamyaran County, Kurdistan Province, Iran
title: Daram
